content:
WorkflowUpdateableControlClient Class

In this Article

Represents a service contract that defines a set of operations that allows a client to update workflow service hosted with WorkflowServiceHost.

Syntax

Declaration

public class WorkflowUpdateableControlClient : System.ServiceModel.ClientBase<System.ServiceModel.Activities.IWorkflowUpdateableInstanceManagement>

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.ServiceModel.ClientBase
  • WorkflowUpdateableControlClient
